messages.message:
Hey team,

Has anyone had any luck running cypress tests locally recently? I wonder if there is a better approach than the one I am currently taking.

After running `PR_NUMBER=74603 ENVIRONMENT=crafting-cyp yarn run e2e:open` with the `baseUrl` being `'https://https--pr-74603-instabase.instabase.site.sandboxes.run/'`
in `crafting-cyp.js`

I opened this PR (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/74603) just so I could grab the auto-generated sandbox url to run tests against.

I get challenged by the Okta sign in screen and after going through the flow I receive "Session Invalid" even though the url works fine in a regular tab?
Yes, you need to set a secret cookie in the env var. Search for `Cypress CI cypress_test_key` in 1pass
